QuestData.Title: The Captive Prospectors
QuestData.Description: Raegar sent a team of prospectors into Dun Argol to search for artifacts and information about the history of the settlement. Raegar's team never expected Dun Argol to be this heavily populated.$B$BThey're being held captive while the iron dwarves prepare for war. We haven't the men to charge in after them, and Raegar's too busy fantasizing about defeating the irons to be of much help.$B$BIt falls to you, $n. Any of the irons or their servants could be carrying the keys to the cages holding our men.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free Prospector Gann, Prospector Torgan, and Prospector Varana, then return to Mountaineer Kilian at Prospector's Point.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you locate the missing prospectors?
QuestData.RewardText: <Mountaineer Kilian listens as you relate what the captive prospectors told you.>$B$BThey mentioned Loken and a war against stone giants? You're certain?$B$BSo Raegar's instincts were right. We have to find a way to get in there and learn more about their plans.
